Question: This person was featured on Nelly's song, "Work It", which was remixed and included on Nelly's 2003 remix album.
Hints: On March 30, 2008, this person performed the song at Madonna's Hard Candy Promo Show at Roseland Ballroom in New York City.
In summer 2003, this person and Christina Aguilera headlined the Justified/Stripped Tour.
In January 2007, this person embarked on the FutureSex/LoveShow tour.
